title: Advocacy & Awareness | Mabuwaya Foundation
intro: The Mabuwaya Foundation implements a range of programs to protect the critically endangered Philippine crocodile and promote community-based conservation in Northern Luzon.

programs.title: Habitat Conservation
programs.description: We protect and restore wetland habitats critical for the survival of the Philippine crocodile in its natural environment.

programs.title: Community Outreach
programs.description: We empower local communities through education, training, and sustainable livelihood programs to support conservation efforts.

programs.title: Scientific Research
programs.description: We conduct field research to monitor crocodile populations, study behavior, and inform conservation strategies.

programs.title: CEPA Campaigns
programs.description: Our Communication, Education, and Public Awareness campaigns help raise knowledge and foster support for crocodile conservation.

programs.title: Species Recovery
programs.description: We reintroduce and reinforce wild populations of the Philippine crocodile through a managed breeding and release program.

programs.title: Spread Awareness
programs.description: We engage with schools, media, and the public to spread awareness on the importance of protecting the Philippine crocodile and its ecosystem.
